data.title: TurboHub - WordPress Control Panel
data.meta_description: A2 Hosting’s WordPress control panel TurboHub allows you to easily manage and improve WordPress sites with performance optimizations, single-click site management, health monitoring and vulnerability alerts. Discover how TurboHub can streamline your WordPress site and elevate your or your clients' websites today!

What is TurboHub?

TurboHub is our exclusive, centralized interface for managing WordPress sites. Use TurboHub to: optimize site performance with AI recommendations, manage user permissions, as well as access, update and secure your sites. It can be accessed directly from all pages within My A2 Hosting.

Effortlessly Monitor Your Website Health

Stay on top of the health of your website with our site health monitoring. It’s perfect for agencies and site owners with multiple websites. This tool gives you a quick snapshot of each site's health and an easy way to fix issues. Through our partnership with Patchstack, we also alert you to high priority plugin vulnerabilities so your site is never at risk. With the ability to see site risk at a glance, it helps you keep everything running smoothly and securely. Managing multiple sites has never been easier!

Easy Client Onboarding with Permission Sharing

Streamline agency workflows and simplify the onboarding process with TurboHub’s permission sharing. Taking on a new client can be a hassle when trying to get log-in information or access to tools and plugins. TurboHub helps alleviate this stress with its easy, one-click ability to grant and request site permissions which will reduce friction in the agency/client onboarding process and make the experience much more enjoyable for everyone involved.

Simple Multisite Plugin Management

Site owners and agencies will easily be able to manage and control WordPress plugins across multiple sites simultaneously. With streamlined bulk actions, you can update, activate, deactivate, and delete plugins across various sites with just a single click, saving you from the hassle of repetitive tasks. Convenient filtering options simplify the process of managing plugins in bulk actions, while the ability to bookmark favorite plugins ensures quick and easy access in the future when building additional sites. This tool not only boosts productivity by letting you focus on more valuable aspects of your work but also eliminates the tediousness of manual plugin management.

Powerful Tools for Easy WordPress Site Building and Management

Build on a rock-solid foundation with the best tools in the industry so you can get your website running in no time.

AI-powered site

performance optimizations

Fast and in-depth performance analysis that highlights top recommendations and allows for one-click changes to instantly boost your site's performance.

User Friendly

Dashboard

TurboHub offers an easy-to-use dashboard for managing all of your WordPress sites. As an agency, manage all your client sites easily. As a site owner, let your agency help you manage your site.

At-a-glance

site health insight

Stay informed about your site's status and easily switch to maintenance mode or hide from search engines. As an agency you can view all your clients’ sites in one location and handle support maintenance with just a click!

Easy plugin

management

TurboHub displays all of your plugin status’ and lets you update, activate, and deactivate WordPress plugins all from one centralized location.

Stay organized with

site tagging

When managing multiple sites, site tagging allows for quick identification and streamlined management that gives you the ability to categorize and label each of your websites with relevant, descriptive tags or labels.

Easy communication

with site notes

Site notes help our agency customers streamline their operations and allows for them to create and share saved notes seamlessly between linked accounts.

Experience The A2 Difference

Up To 20X

That means better SEO rankings, lower bounce rates & higher conversion rates!

Frequently Asked Questions

Have questions about working with WordPress or WordPress Hosting? Here are some that we get asked from time-to-time. You can also check out our TurboHub Knowledge Base and our WordPress blog too. If you still have questions, remember our Guru Crew is here to help 24 hours a day!

TurboHub is A2 Hosting’s exclusive, centralized interface for managing WordPress sites. TurboHub helps optimize WordPress performance and simplify site management, all from one convenient interface.

TurboHub’s features include:

Quick access to all of your WordPress sites.

Ability to grant access to users managing your account, or request access to sites you manage for others.

AI-powered optimizations to help boost site performance.

Automatic plugin updates for each site.

Site performance metrics.

Site notes to enable easy communication between team members or companies.

Quick access to databases, files, and email.

Status information that lets you know your sites are online and running, including SSL, domain, and nameserver status.

Ability to hide sites from search engines while under construction.

Ability to place sites in maintenance mode during edits.

You can easily access TurboHub from within the A2 Hosting Customer Portal. Log in, click the “TurboHub for WordPress” button, and the TurboHub dashboard appears with all of your WordPress sites. Then enjoy an improved WordPress management experience using all of the features and capabilities that TurboHub offers!

TurboHub is currently only available for WordPress.
